doc:
Mark Consuelos https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Consuelos 0 Mark Andrew Consuelos (born March 30, 1971) is an American actor. He is best known for his portrayal of Hiram Lodge on The CW drama Riverdale (2017-present), for which he attained Teen Choice Award for Choice TV Villain. Mark_Andrew_Consuelos ( born March_30 , 1971 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_portrayal of Hiram_Lodge on The_CW_drama_Riverdale_(_2017-present_) , for which he attained Teen_Choice_Award for Choice_TV_Villain .
